__e: Er, it's just that I heard you were complaining about me.
You were the one bitching at me last night for being on the phone so late.
I was complaining to George that he was never at home and he said

Can't exactly keep complaining about my life and not doing anything about it.
You are clearly still feeling better if you are calling me on my grammar.
You were the one complaining that I wasn't saying anything.
Not long ago I'd have thought you were complaining... that you needed water.

Beer doesn't taste as good when your wife's moaning at you
